title: Supreme Court upholds APTEL order restoring solar power tariff
description: The Supreme Court has upheld APTEL's order restoring the tariff of â‚¹8.40 per unit to solar power developers in Karnataka. The court also extended the scheduled commissioning date under a force majeure clause.
